title: Great price great location friendly informative staff and clean room!
text: My wife and I wanted a comfortable, reasonably priced , clean room, in a location handy to public transportation, restaurants and points of interest. This budget hotel fulfilled our requirements perfectly with a very clean room and king sized bed. Everything worked to our satisfaction including a very quiet efficient heater. The staff was helpful and informative. We stayed 3 evenings and would highly recommend this hotel. We will gladly stay again on our next trip to San Francisco.
